name: cybersecurityjunior
description: CybersecurityJunior Jekyll site with Stackbit integration

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.kill: pkill -f 'jekyll serve' || echo 'No Jekyll processes found'
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill && sleep 1 && npm run dev

_comment: All Jekyll commands use 'bundle exec' to ensure version consistency with Gemfile.lock
